Specimen Type: Cerebrospinal fluid, throat swab, nasopharyngeal swab, stool, or other relevant clinical specimens
Purpose: Qualitative detection of parechovirus RNA to aid in the diagnosis of parechovirus infection.
Container: Viral transport media (or sterile container appropriate to specimen type)
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, microcentrifuge, biosafety cabinet, vortex mixer, micropipettes with sterile aerosol-barrier tips
